message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think the price is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

I understand you think the price is a bit high, but I have to consider my own costs and value. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1050000. This is a compromise that I think is reasonable, considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value I'll get from it.

I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to make another compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $1050000 again, but this time it's not a compromise, it's a non-negotiable price. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
